title: The Draymond Green Show - Seth Curry
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - Seth Curry
description:
Seth Curry of the Brooklyn Nets joins ‘The Draymond Green Show’ to discuss his journey from Liberty to Duke (3:00), what it’s like playing with Kyrie Irving and Kevin Durant (7:00), making his own path separate from Steph (15:00), his take on Joel Embiid and the MVP race this year (26:00), the issue with refereeing in the NBA today (33:00), and what the Nets have to do to win a championship this year (42:00).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
